product_name: The North Face Flux Powerstretch Jacket - Women's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Made from durable Polartec(R) Power Stretch(R) fleece, the women's Flux Powerstretch Jacket from The North Face is an extremely warm stretch fleece for vertical pursuits. Polartec Power Stretch fleece is smooth on the outside, brushed on the inside. Sports a close alpine fit with 4-way stretch. Wear this jacket under an outer shell for maximum protection and warmth. Elastic binding at hem and cuffs. Women's Flux Powerstretch Jacket from The North Face has 2 zippered pockets. Closeout.
short_description: Made from durable Polartec(R) Power Stretch(R) fleece, the women's Flux Powerstretch Jacket from The North Face is an extremely warm stretch fleece for vertical pursuits.
